00047 #include "ray.h"

00049 #include <Ogre.h>
00050 
00051 #include <ostream>

00053 namespace phys
00054 {
00055 
00056     ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00057     // Constructors
00058     Ray::Ray():From(0,0,0),To(0,1,0)
00059     {
00060 
00061     }
00062 
00063     Ray::Ray(Vector3 From_, Vector3 To_)
00064     {
00065         this->From=From_;
00066         this->To=To_;
00067     }
00068 
00069     Ray::Ray(Ogre::Ray Ray2)
00070     {
00071         this->From=Ray2.getOrigin();
00072         this->To=Ray2.getPoint(1);
00073     }
00074 
00075 
00076     ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00077     // Manual Conversions and adjsutments
00078     Ogre::Ray Ray::GetOgreRay() const
00079     {
00080 
00081         Ray Temp = this->GetNormal();
00082         /*return Ogre::Ray(
00083             Temp.From.GetOgreVector3(),
00084             Temp.To.GetNormal().GetOgreVector3()
00085         );// */
00086         return Ogre::Ray(
00087             this->From.GetOgreVector3(),
00088             this->To.GetOgreVector3()
00089         );// */
00090     }
00091 
00092     Real Ray::Length() const
00093     {
00094         return this->From.Distance( this->To );
00095     }
00096 
00097     Ray Ray::GetNormal() const
00098     {
00099         Real TempLength = this->Length();
00100         if (0!=TempLength)
00101         {
00102             return (*this) / TempLength;
00103         }else{
00104             /// @todo discuss the merits throwing an error here.
00105             return (*this);
00106             //return 0;
00107         }
00108     }
00109 
00110     void Ray::Normalize()
00111     {
00112         Real TempLength = this->Length();
00113         if (0!=TempLength)
00114         {
00115             (*this) /= this->Length();
00116         }else{
00117             // nothing to change, we have a zero length Ray
00118         }
00119 
00120     }
00121 
00122     ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00123     // Real Operators and assignments
00124     Ray Ray::operator* (const Real &scalar) const
00125     {
00126         return Ray(
00127             this->From,
00128             ((this->To - this->From) * scalar) + this->From
00129         );
00130     }
00131 
00132     Ray Ray::operator/ (const Real &scalar) const
00133     {
00134         return Ray(
00135             this->From,
00136             ((this->To - this->From) / scalar) + this->From
00137         );
00138     }
00139 
00140     void Ray::operator*= (const Real &scalar)
00141     {
00142         this->To = ((this->To - this->From) * scalar) + this->From;
00143     }
00144 
00145     void Ray::operator/= (const Real &scalar)
00146     {
00147         this->To = ((this->To - this->From) / scalar) + this->From;
00148     }
00149 
00150 }

00152 std::ostream& operator << (std::ostream& stream, const phys::Ray& x)
00153 {
00154     stream << "[" << x.From << "," << x.To << "]";
00155     return stream;
00156 }
